channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- Cisco IC3000 Industrial Compute Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- Cisco IC3000 Industrial Compute Gateway

item.title: CVE-2019-12714|2024-09-16T21:07:57.539Z -- cisco -- cisco%20ic3000%20industrial%20compute%20gateway
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco IC3000 Industrial Compute Gateway could allow an authenticated, remote attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition on an affected device. The vulnerability exists because the affected software improperly manages system resources. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by opening a large number of simultaneous sessions on the web-based management interface of an affected device. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to cause a DoS condition of the web-based management interface, preventing normal management operations.
